name: Lili Rochefort
bio: Lili has all the classic characteristics of an excessively spoiled girl. The only child of a wealthy oil industrialist, Lili seems to have always had a very comfortable life. She is also very mannered in her gestures during her cutscenes. Her bourgeois side being highlighted when she announces it is time for her afternoon tea, a habit that was very widespread among the aristocracy. This habit is also shown in one of her intros in Tekken 7 where she is having tea before the fight.
